member.name: T:Plugin.VersionTracking.CrossVersionTracking
member.summary: Cross platform VersionTracking implemenations

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.CrossVersionTracking.Current
member.summary: Current settings to use

member.name: T:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation
member.summary: Implementation for VersionTracking

member.name: M:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.Track
member.summary: Call this as the VERY FIRST THING in FinishedLaunching

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.IsFirstLaunchEver
member.summary: Check if this is the first time ever that the app is launched.

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.IsFirstLaunchForVersion
member.summary: Check if this is the first time that this particular version is being launched.
member.value: The is first launch for current version.

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.IsFirstLaunchForBuild
member.summary: Check if this is the first time that this particular build is being launched.
member.value: The is first launch for current build.

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Returns the current version of the app, as defined in the PList, e.g. "4.3".

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.CurrentBuild
member.summary: Returns the current build of the app, as defined in the PList, e.g. "4300".

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.PreviousVersion
member.summary: Returns the previous version of the app, e.g. "4.3".

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.PreviousBuild
member.summary: Returns the previous build of the app, "4300".

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.FirstInstalledVersion
member.summary: Returns the version which the user first installed the app.

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.FirstInstalledBuild
member.summary: Returns the build which the user first installed the app.

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.VersionHistory
member.summary: Returns a List of versions which the user has had installed, e.g. ["3.5", "4.0", "4.1"]. The List is ordered from first version installed to (including) the current version

member.name: P:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.BuildHistory
member.summary: Returns a List of builds which the user has had installed, e.g. ["3500", "4000", "4100"]. The List is ordered from first build installed to (including) the current build

member.name: M:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.FirstLaunchForVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Check if this is the first launch for a particular version number. Useful if you want to execute some code for first time launches of a particular version (like db migrations?).

member.name: M:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.FirstLaunchForBuild(System.String)
member.summary: Check if this is the first launch for a particular build number. Useful if you want to execute some code for first time launches of a particular version (like db migrations?).

member.name: M:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.OnFirstLaunchOfVersion(System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: Calls block if the condition is satisfied that the current version matches `version`, and this is the first time this app version is being launched.

member.name: M:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.OnFirstLaunchOfBuild(System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: Calls block if the condition is satisfied that the current build matches `build`, and this is the first time this app build is being launched.

member.name: M:Plugin.VersionTracking.VersionTrackingImplementation.ToString
member.summary: Output to string
